titleStmt.title: A most cruel and terrible engagement between the confederates of the Upper and Lower Alsatias, the Palatinate of Dorset-Gardinia with the confines, and territories of Shark-Island, and the scandalous sanctuary, on the one side, and the Posse Com. Luxemburgians, and Tory-Drivers on the other.

A most cruel and terrible engagement between the confederates of the Upper and Lower Alsatias, the Palatinate of Dorset-Gardinia with the confines, and territories of Shark-Island, and the scandalous sanctuary, on the one side, and the Posse Com. Luxemburgians, and Tory-Drivers on the other.

notesStmt.note: A political satire on John Dutton, described as a Roman Catholic, "living at the sign of the sugar-loaf, within Temple-Bar ..."
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
